title: Charming and the Cherry Blossom
description:
Today was a fairy tale…
I inherited a fortune from a dad I never knew,And a thoroughly charming guy asked me out.Unfortunately, my fairy tale could disappear in ninety days... Because there’s an impossible task to complete,And a greedy cousin plotting against me.Plus, I’m not your typical fairy tale princess.I have a secret that might send my charming running,And threatens my future if the press finds out.If today was a fairy tale…Why does my happily ever after look so far out of reach?From award-winning author, LJ Evans, comes a contemporary romance filled with all the magic, hope, and love of a fairy tale plus the slow-burn, old-soul vibe her fans adore. Inspired by Taylor Swift’s “Today Was a Fairytale,” this small-town romance is pure escapism.A full-length, standalone adult romance.
author: L.J. Evans
